headline.main: Opel Works Council Must Be Involved in PSA Plans: Germany
headline.print_headline: Opel Works Council Must Be Involved in PSA Plans: Germany

lead_paragraph: The works council of Opel and its British Vauxhall brand must be fully involved in talks with PSA Group on how to turn around the struggling carmaker, German Economy Minister Brigitte Zypries said on Monday.
snippet: The works council of Opel and its British Vauxhall brand must be fully involved in talks with PSA Group on how to turn around the struggling carmaker, German Economy Minister Brigitte Zypries said on Monday....
